messages.messageBody:
--- In UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com, AtticOfThought@a...
wrote:
I hope some one answers your e-mail with
> the resources you requested, because I'm sure it would be a big
help for both
> your daughter and me!

Hi, just wanted to let you know that we found a pretty nice, fairly
active group on Yahoo called unschoolingteens. Hope this helps and
the other suggestions that some folks have made!

Cyndi

messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Any Yahoo groups for unschooling kids/social ques...
messages.msgSnippet: Why don t the two of you start your own yahoo! group. It s really easy. Shawn AtticOfThought@aol.com wrote: Haha! This is probably a pretty unnecessary e-mail,
messages.messageBody:
Why don't the two of you start your own yahoo! group. It's really easy.

Shawn

AtticOfThought@... wrote:

Haha!
This is probably a pretty unnecessary e-mail, but I just wanted to let you
know that I know exactly where your daughter is coming from. I'm an unschooler
too, and all I seem to be able to do is contact parents of unschoolers...witch
doesn't do me very good when I'm looking for other unschoolers to socialize
with. I hope some one answers your e-mail with
the resources you requested, because I'm sure it would be a big help for both
your daughter and me!

messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Any Yahoo groups for unschooling kids/social ques...
messages.msgSnippet: Haha! This is probably a pretty unnecessary e-mail, but I just wanted to let you know that I know exactly where your daughter is coming from. I m an unschooler
messages.messageBody:
Haha!
This is probably a pretty unnecessary e-mail, but I just wanted to let you
know that I know exactly where your daughter is coming from. I'm an unschooler
too, and all I seem to be able to do is contact parents of unschoolers...witch
doesn't do me very good when I'm looking for other unschoolers to socialize
with. I hope some one answers your e-mail with
the resources you requested, because I'm sure it would be a big help for both
your daughter and me!
